content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. All attempts to deploy a Lab (the intended structure for supplying Automation Science Packs) have failed due to inventory and resource shortages. While the agent accessed existing smelting facilities (an iron furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) for processing raw materials, no new building constructions have been completed.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities API misuse
 – Verify the function signature before calling. Avoid using unsupported keywords (such as “radius”) or supplying extra positional arguments.
 – Incorporate proper fallback handling when the call returns None to prevent iteration errors.
• Lab placement and crafting failures
 – Confirm that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement.
 – Check for resource sufficiency by ensuring all required sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are available prior to initiating Lab crafting.
 – Validate that retrieved collections are not None before iterating over them.
